attributes.action: Get more support and help for Autism/Asperger's and Autistic spectrum Disorder in Kent
attributes.additional_details:
We are fighting to get put in place Care and Support for young adults who fall on the Autistic Spectrum. There is nothing in Kent for young adults once they transition from CAMHs at 18 years.
We have a part time service that see 2 people a week, that is it.
